b: ^Mouse Jared: *Kicks a loose pebble and glares* Look, man, I've heard how you're treatin' people in here. Why don't you go harass some mice in suits? I'm just tryin' to tune my gear.
^Mouse Jared: *Adjusts his leather vest nervously* This is total bogus! I was just fixin' my guitar stand, got glue everywhere. You cops see a rocker and immediately think "trouble."

greeting: ^Fixing a guitar stand? Did what, exactly?
^Save the "innocent artist" act, Jared. You did it.
play_stupid: ^Mouse Jared: *He scoffs, leaning against the wall* Kill the guy. The one they found. I'm just sayin' I didn't see nothin'.
^Wait... you knew it was a guy? I haven't released that info yet.
^Was he one of your "customers," Jared? Looking for a different kind of high?
play_stupid2: ^Mouse Jared: *He freezes for a split second, then sneers* Everyone's talking, man. You must be blind if you think secrets stay secret in this sewer.
Weird: ^Mouse Jared: *Straightens up, looking defensive* I sell sound, man. Not substances. I'm not talkin' to you anymore. You're startin' to sound like a narc.
no_thanks: ^Mouse Jared: *Spits on the floor* Detective, disrespectfully... leave. I got a rehearsal and you're blowin' my vibe.
Sniffed_glue_reaction: ^Mouse Jared: *Eyes widen in genuine shock* Hey! Quit huffing my guitar glue! That stuff is industrial grade, man. It'll melt your whiskers off!
^So it IS your glue? Thanks for the admission, "bro."
glue_admission: ^Mouse Jared: *Realizes his slip-up and grits his teeth* Yeah, for my gear! I'm a musician! What are you implying?! That it's a crime to keep your instruments together?
special_event_cocaine_gone: ^Mouse Jared: *Backing away, staring at your twitching tail* Whoa, dude... your eyes are like saucers. You okay? You're literally vibrating. I think you've been on the force too long.
Ate_cheese_1: ^Mouse Jared: *Grimaces in disgust* Dude, don't eat stuff off the floor. That's nasty, even for a rat. That was evidence... and now it's just your afternoon snack? Gross.
has_phone_clue_1: ^Mouse Jared: *Stares at the device in your hand* I don't text, man. I shred. Technology is for the establishment.
^This phone has texts about a 'delivery' at the club.
phone_denial_rocker: ^Mouse Jared: *Shakes his head* Not mine, bro. I use a pager. Vintage. Harder for "The Mouse" to track, you feel me?
